column4: I'm trying to add My Documents from a windows computer as an automount in fstab but I don't think it's recognizes the syntax I'm using for My Documents.  What do I use for the space?  in the network browser it uses my%20documents.
what are you mounting exactly? another partition, drive? or is this some sort of samba share or what
well I would guess you want to put my\ documents, or perhaps quote the entire thing "my documents"
